Yelling where’s the rest of you “white fuckers at, huh? Where the rest of you white pieces of shit at”

He then says “I’ve been waiting for this” posted 3 days ago by PiratePatriotParrot 129 comments award share report block Wall Street Apes @WallStreetApes • 3d Muslims furiously yelling ‘looking for White people’ Yelling where’s the rest of you “white f*ckers at, huh? Where the rest of you white pieces of sh*t at” He then says “I’ve been waiting for this” This is in America. Wake up
